Name: Holt
About the game: Holt is very ealy in development and is subject to drastic changes throughout its lifetime. Please be mindful when playing or testing the game. If you run into any errors please leave any feedback on our discussions. Holt will be releasing on a chapter basis and each new chapter will evolve the story more! Holt is a 2D action platformer with a rich story. Shoot, slash, and adventure through levels of enemies and meet new friends along the way. Find out what has happened in the past and find out what the future holds. Colorful characters Rich combat Customization In-depth lore Explore the world after the war Dig up the past
